Title: Authorizes prosecuting agency to move to have identity of undercover public officers and employees protected while testifying in court
Summary: Authorizes the people in a criminal proceeding, the presentment agency in a juvenile delinquency proceeding and a governmental agency or public employer in a civil enforcement action to move to protect the identity, address and any other identifying information of any witness who is an undercover public officer or employee when the disclosure of the identity of such officer or employee would endanger the officer's life or employee's life or compromise his or her continued effectiveness.
LawCode: Amd ยง50-a, Civ Rts L; amd ยง60.15, CP L; add ยง343.6, Fam Ct Act; add R4516-a, CPLR
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil rights law, the criminal procedure law, the family court act and the civil practice law and rules, in relation to protecting the identity of undercover public officers and employees
